solution_line_template: There were {total_voters}-{john_votes}=<<{total_voters}-{john_votes}={remaining_votes}>>{remaining_votes} people who didn't vote for John
So the other candidate got {remaining_votes}-{james_votes}=<<{remaining_votes}-{james_votes}={third_guy_votes}>>{third_guy_votes} votes
This means he got {third_guy_votes}-{john_votes}=<<{third_guy_votes}-{john_votes}={vote_difference}>>{vote_difference} more votes than John.
